code: import axios from'axios';var baseUserService=axios.create({baseURL:'/api/user'});var getUserById=function getUserById(id){console.log(id);return baseUserService.get("/".concat(id),id).then(function(result){var user=result.data.user;var projects=result.data.projects;var actions=result.data.actions;console.log('actions',actions);return Promise.resolve({user:user,projects:projects,actions:actions});}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var updateUser=function updateUser(body){var form=new FormData();form.append('username',body.username);form.append('location',body.location);form.append('bio',body.bio);if(body.pictureUrl!==null)form.append('pictureUrl',body.pictureUrl);return baseUserService.post("/".concat(body._id,"/edit"),form).then(function(result){var user=result.data.user;return Promise.resolve(user);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var getActionsByUserId=function getActionsByUserId(userId){return baseUserService.get("/".concat(userId,"/actions")).then(function(result){var actions=result.data.actions;return Promise.resolve(actions);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var getProjectsByUserId=function getProjectsByUserId(userId){return baseUserService.get("/".concat(userId,"/projects")).then(function(result){var projects=result.data.projects;return Promise.resolve(projects);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};export{getProjectsByUserId,getActionsByUserId,updateUser,getUserById};
